rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: The entrance hall leads into a spacious open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. Designed in Mediterranean style with warm color palettes, textured tiles, and arches.
rooms.Vastu: North-east corner to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Mediterranean styled kitchen with modern appliances and natural stone countertops. Connects seamlessly with the living area.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Cozy library space with built-in shelves and comfortable seating. Designed as a quiet retreat on the south-east side.
rooms.Vastu: Placed in the east to encourage learning and creativity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample storage and a private balcony. Located in the north-west area for enhanced positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bedroom with a view of the garden. Located in the south-west region.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Master)
rooms.description: Modern bathroom adjacent to master bedroom with Italian marble finishes.
